publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-660 Patricia Ferguson: NCH and Glasgow Perthshire Juniors Challenge Projectâ€”That the Parliament notes the valuable collaboration between NCH and Glasgow Perthshire junior football club in providing a meaningful renovation project for 10 young people; congratulates the young people involved who learned new skills and teamwork, and notes with satisfaction that all 10 have achieved employment or meaningful training opportunities as a result.
S3M-660 NCH and Glasgow Perthshire Juniors Challenge Project (lodged on 19 October 2007) Sandra White*
S3M-660 NCH and Glasgow Perthshire Juniors Challenge Project (lodged on 19 October 2007) Jack McConnell*
